forum.content:
Fifty Flashes of Fiction holds 50 short reads in one single ebook for all those long commutes to wherever, or lengthy trips to the toilet. Out now at a ebook store near you. Side-effects may include prolonged periods of reading.

Amazon: http://bit.ly/50fofam
Kobo: http://bit.ly/50fofko
iBooks: http://bit.ly/50fofib
Barnes & Noble: http://bit.ly/50fofbn
Google Play: http://bit.ly/50fofgp
Smashwords: http://bit.ly/50fofsw
forum.title: Fifty Flashes of Fiction
